Interface Heuristic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomHeuristic, ZeroHeuristic

    public interface Heuristic
    A strategy to be utilised by AStarSearch to optimize the search.
    Author:
    Zac Hamid - z5059915
    See Also:
    CustomHeuristic, ZeroHeuristic

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <E> int getHCost(State<E> state)
      Finds an approximation as to how far away the current State is from a goal State.

    • Method Detail

      • getHCost

        <E> int getHCost(State<E> state)
        Finds an approximation as to how far away the current State is from a goal State.
        Parameters:
        state - The current State.
        Returns:
        A guess of how far away the current State is from the goal State, the StateComparator then uses this guess to sort the State objects in a PriorityQueue by f(x) = g(x) + h(x), where:
        • f(x) an approximation of how much the path containing this State will cost
        • g(x) is the actual cost of the path taken till the current State.
        • h(x) the guess returned by getHCost(State).
